channel.title: 317 Clean Server
channel.description:
PLEASE NOTE THAT I DO NOT OWN THIS SERVER. I TAKE ONLY 0.1% OF CREDS FOR REPOSTING THIS SOURCE.
ok so i know this is very basic, but i have seen it all over these forums, most people by now allready know how this is done but for the few people who want a clean 317 PI client and source well here it is.
now i know this is my first release but, you have to start somewhere. The media is just basic because of the pure fact there is not much there. credits - XxJtxX - 99% for producing the guide. (Don't know if it is a repost, don't rage at me if it is ) - Me - 1% for following the easy guide and releasing to those who can't follow.
source - http://up.ht/L6WutG
[Webclient ready] client - http://up.ht/L6WoSQ
Fixed cache - http://dl.dropbox.com/u/90839248/cache.zip (this link is temp untill upit has uploaded, taking forever)
Cache - http://up.ht/L6WhXm
1) your going to have to upload the cache to dropbox or any other filehosting website. 2) copy the link of that file. 3) find the file "cachedownloader" and open it. 4) at the top you should see somthing called "private String cacheLink = "REPLACE THIS WITH YOUR UPLOADED CACHE LINK"; // Link to cache" 5) replace the link. 6) compile. 7) check it works. 8) jar it and sign it. 9) put it on a website for a webclient. 10) play it.

item.title: 317 Clean Server
item.dc:creator: @BeardGasm BeardGasm
item.description:
@BeardGasm wrote:

PLEASE NOTE THAT I DO NOT OWN THIS SERVER.
I TAKE ONLY 0.1% OF CREDS FOR REPOSTING THIS SOURCE.

ok so i know this is very basic, but i have seen it all over these forums, most people by now allready know how this is done but for the few people who want a clean 317 PI client and source well here it is.

now i know this is my first release but, you have to start somewhere. The media is just basic because of the pure fact there is not much there.
credits - XxJtxX - 99% for producing the guide. (Don’t know if it is a repost, don’t rage at me if it is )
- Me - 1% for following the easy guide and releasing to those who can’t follow.

source - http://up.ht/L6WutG

[Webclient ready] client - http://up.ht/L6WoSQ

Fixed cache - http://dl.dropbox.com/u/90839248/cache.zip (this link is temp untill upit has uploaded, taking forever)

Cache - http://up.ht/L6WhXm

  1. your going to have to upload the cache to dropbox or any other filehosting website.
  2. copy the link of that file.
  3. find the file “cachedownloader” and open it.
  4. at the top you should see somthing called “private String cacheLink = “REPLACE THIS WITH YOUR UPLOADED CACHE LINK”; // Link to cache”
  5. replace the link.
  6. compile.
  7. check it works.
  8. jar it and sign it.
  9. put it on a website for a webclient.
  10. play it.
